name: Glow Up Power Bowl
preparation: In a Round or Multipurpose Steamer, combine rice and 2 cups water. Top with tray and microwave uncovered on high for 16–18 min, or until tender.
Divide all other power bowl ingredients into 4 bowls or meal prep containers.
In a small prep bowl, whisk all dressing ingredients until combined.
Drizzle dressing over each bowl and enjoy.
tips: If placing prepared power bowl in meal prep containers, portion dressing in separate containers. Before serving, drizzle dressing over power bowl and shake to coat.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice & noodle dish.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
